comments.en:
Tim Engler's driver (lm1100) now supports 300 dpi in color and b&w. The printer also no longer needs WinDOS to switch cartridges. You can download the necessary software to do this from Tim Engler's lm1100 web page. It can print plain ASCII through gs.

Consumables/Refills: Cartridge and Printhead together. No separate Colors.
